message:
Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product, which holds immense value to us at $1500000. I understand its significance to you and would like to propose a fair deal that benefits both parties. Considering the exceptional quality and the unique features of this product, I am extending an offer to purchase it from us for $1250000. This price reflects a strategic balance between maintaining a reasonable profit margin for us and offering you a competitive advantage.

Please let me know if you are interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the transaction. I am here to answer any questions you might have and to ensure a smooth process throughout.

Best regards,
Alice
